main event: A witness in Saddle Bunch Shores, near Key West, Florida, observed a brilliantly luminous object approaching from the north on the night of July 18, 1963.
interesting points: The object was silent and traveling at a tremendous rate of speed, completing its course overhead and turning into a whitish cloud of smoke.
The object was as large as the full moon and appeared to be about the same distance from the witness.
There was no trail, sparks, fire, or flame, and all lights or fire had disappeared.
The witness reported that the object seemed to be drifting or towing something similar in size and appearance, traveling at a much higher speed.
When the object suddenly disappeared, it seemed to travel at a speed that the witness considered most impossible for any type of craft.
location: Saddle Bunch Shores, Key West, Florida
